title: Embedded Software Developer – Lund
description:
Till vår kunds team i Lund söker vi en erfaren **Embedded Software Developer** som vill arbeta med spännande IoT- och eBike-lösningar. Du kommer att vara delaktig i hela utvecklingsprocessen – från hårdvaruutvärdering och design till integration, test och underhåll – och bidra till utvecklingen av **cykeldatorer, connectivity-moduler och andra eBike-komponenter**.

**Om rollen:**

* Designa, integrera och debugga mjukvara för embedded IoT-produkter.


-Arbeta med RTOS och utveckling på system med begränsade resurser (minnes- och strömoptimering).

* Delta i algoritmutveckling och interaktion med cloud backend och mobilappar.

* Arbeta agilt i tvärfunktionella team och bidra med erfarenhet inom både hårdvara, mjukvara och test.


**Vi söker dig som:**

* Har Master/Bachelor inom Elektroteknik, Datavetenskap eller liknande.

* Har 10+ års erfarenhet av embedded software-utveckling, gärna inom IoT.

* Har erfarenhet av IoT-nätverksprotokoll (CoAP, MQTT, REST) och/eller V2X (DSRC eller c-V2X).

* Är van vid C++ på RTOS-system, integration och debugging av sub-system och perifera enheter (t.ex. via JTAG).

* Har hands-on erfarenhet av Bluetooth/BLE, WiFi, UWB eller NFC.

* Jobbar strukturerat med DevSecOps, CI/CD och automatiserad säkerhetstestning.


**Meriterande erfarenheter:**

* Serviceutveckling och IoT-hantering

* Low-power design och mätning

* Programmering i C

* Algoritmutveckling och maskininlärning

* Erfarenhet av Atlassian-verktyg


**Personliga egenskaper:**

  

Du är en lagspelare med starkt driv och positiv attityd, tar ägarskap över dina uppdrag och levererar i tid. Du vill kontinuerligt lära dig nytt, delar gärna med dig av din kunskap och är ofta den som kollegor vänder sig till för tekniska frågor.

**Plats:** Lund  

**Uppdragslängd:** 01/12/2025 – 31/01/2027- med möjlighet till förlägning!

title: Java/Scala Developer
description:
Vi söker en Java/Scala Developer till vår kund Malmö som vill arbeta med stora datamängder och innovativa lösningar. I rollen kommer du bygga big data-tjänster och pipelines, utveckla algoritmer för datakonflation, identifiera anomalier samt förbättra effektivitet, skalbarhet och hantering av stora datamängder. Du förväntas även identifiera och föreslå förbättringar, automatisera processer och delta i kravställning och lösningsdesign.

**Om rollen:**

* Utveckla algoritmer och system för hantering av stora datamängder.

* Bygga effektiva big data-pipelines och tjänster i **Scala**.

* Identifiera förbättringsmöjligheter och implementera automatisering.

* Delta i design, kravställning och lösning av komplexa problem.

* Samarbeta med ett team av erfarna utvecklare för att hitta bästa lösningar.


**Vi söker dig som:**


-Har djup erfarenhet av **JVM, helst Scala**, och starka programmerings- och designkunskaper.

* Är analytisk, problemlösningsorienterad och kreativ i din approach.

* Har erfarenhet av big data-ramverk som **Spark, Akka, Play**, ETL-processer och data streaming.

* Behärskar engelska i tal och skrift.

* Är bosatt i Sverige eller redo att flytta, gärna nära Malmö då arbetet är på plats.


**Meriterande erfarenheter:**

* Event streaming, t.ex. Kafka

* Design och implementering av APIs och REST-tjänster

* NoSQL-databaser

* Erfarenhet av att applicera **Machine Learning eller AI** på stora datamängder

**Låter detta som något för dig? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag!**

title: Front-End Developer
description:
**About Maurten**


Maurten fuels the fastest to gold medals and world records. Using patented Maurten Hydrogel Technology, athletes can more easily tolerate sports fuel while training and racing. The innovation allows carbohydrates to be encapsulated in hydrogel and transported smoothly to the intestines where they are broken down and used as fuel. Combining research–driven development alongside feedback from runners, cyclists, and triathletes, Maurten’s fueling ecosystem enables all humans to become greater athletes.


Maurten is moving fast. We’re looking for people who share our passion for sport — and who want to shape the way athletes around the world fuel.

**Job responsibilities**


As part of the Sports Tech team, the front-end developer will work with the R&D and Design team to turn scientific and product requirements into elegant, scalable interfaces aligned to Maurten’s de-sign language. Own the front‑end architecture and tooling across our web applications, establishing a shared component library/design system and setting standards for state management, routing, performance budgets, and testing. Deliver secure, accessible, and performant UIs and integrate cleanly with back‑end services while collaborating on API contracts and data models. Champion engineering quality through reviews, linters, type safety, automated tests, and CI/CD, and instrument products for observability and learning. Ensure data privacy and compliance (e.g., GDPR), follow re-lease governance, and document decisions, systems, and runbooks to enable reliable operations and handover.


Experience with cross-platform frameworks (e.g., React Native, Expo, or similar) is highly valued, as we explore extending our web experiences to mobile platforms.


Running Tasks

* Build and ship user-facing features across our external and internal tools with TypeScript/Re-act (or equivalent modern framework) and CSS/utility-first styling.
* Maintain and evolve the front-end codebase: refactoring, dependency hygiene, and performance tuning against agreed budgets.
* Guard accessibility and quality: conduct audits, write tests (unit/e2e), and resolve defects with urgency.
* Operate production systems: triage issues, monitor health, and drive continuous improve-ment using telemetry and user feedback.
* Collaborate with Design to review components and interactions; ensure pixel-perfect execution where it matters and purposeful pragmatism elsewhere.


Developing Tasks

* Stand up and steward a Maurten front-end design system and component library (theming, tokens, documentation site, contribution guidelines).
* Prototype new interaction patterns and data visualizations to explore concepts rapidly and validate with stakeholders and users.
* Introduce progressive enhancements (PWA capabilities, offline modes, background sync) where they improve athlete experience.
* Evolve build and release workflows (modular monorepo, CI pipelines, preview environments, visual regression testing).
* Evaluate emerging web technologies and frameworks for future adoption; create lightweight RFCs to guide decisions.

**Who you are:**


As part of a small and quickly growing team, you demonstrate a strong ownership mindset — ac-countable for outcomes, pragmatic about trade-offs, and proactive in reducing technical debt. You’re a collaborative communicator who works effectively across relevant teams (Design, R&D, and Sport Tech), with clear written and verbal alignment. You’re user-centred and data-informed, combining qualitative insights with telemetry to guide decisions. With a passion for sports and performance and with high scientific credibility, you combine high standard front-end development with domain knowledge to create solutions that help athletes. A curious, systematic and resilient mindset lets you comfortably iterate, experiment and learn.


Required

* Proven experience delivering modern, production-scale web applications.
* Minimum 2 years of experience
* Expert knowledge of HTML5, CSS3 (including modern layout systems), and TypeScript/JavaS-cript.
* Deep hands-on experience with React (or similar, e.g., Next.js), including state management (Redux or Zustand), data fetching (React Query) and form handing and validation (Formik/Yup).
* Proficiency with component styling frameworks such as Styled Components or Tailwind CSS and familiarity with UI libraries (Radix UI/Material UI/Hero UI).
* Strong testing practice (Jest/Vitest, Playwright/Cypress) and CI/CD familiarity.
* Accessibility proficiency (WCAG 2.1+), performance optimization (LCP/CLS/INP), and responsive design.
* Comfortable integrating REST/GraphQL APIs and working with design tools (e.g., Figma) and design tokens.
* Version control (Git) and collaborative workflows (code reviews, trunk/branch strategies).
* Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in relevant field


Nice to Have

* Mobile/web cross-platform exposure (E.g. Flutter, React Native) and an interest in extending web experiences to mobile is a strong plus.
* Data visualisation (D3, Charting libs) and/or WebGL/Canvas (Three.js) for performance ana-lytics.
* Experience with SSR/SSG (Next.js), edge runtimes/CDNs, and cloud hosting (e.g., Vercel/Az-ure).
* Familiarity with Node.js back-end patterns, authentication/authorisation, and security best practices.
* Understanding of sports performance domains, wearable data, or human-computer interaction.

**Is this you?**


If you’re interested in joining Maurten, submit your application — **in English**. We apply a continuous selection process, and the job post will be open until the position is filled. Both professional background and individual qualities will be taken into consideration during the interview process. Be part of shaping the future of fueling.

title: C# developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Experience with code refactoring and systems development
* Deep knowledge in C#
* Previous experience working in / developing frameworks in a game development setting.
* Not afraid of facing (and embracing) the unknown and working with exploratory tasks.
* Understand and agree with Test Driven Development and Behavior Driven Development
* Have a software engineering mindset, and a grasp of software engineering principles such as SOLID
* Team player with strong self-leadership, can-do attitude and business sense


**Meritorious**

* Experience with Unity is a plus but not a must.

 18-11-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Experienced Frontend Developer
description:
For over 30 years, Wisentic has helped insurers work smarter through automation and innovation. Today, we’re one of the most trusted insurtech companies in the Nordics, using our SaaS products to simplify complexity, accelerate efficiency, and help insurers achieve their goals faster. Our teams are small, empowered, and focused on delivering real value to our customers - not just shipping features.
   

  

 The role
   

  

 We’re looking for an Experienced Frontend Developer who wants to help take our products to the next level, with a focus on building modern, stable, and well-thought-out user interfaces.
   

  

 At Wisentic, you’ll work across both of our product areas – Arbit (claims automation) and Inspira (digitalization of insurance processes).
   

  

 You’ll take broad responsibility for the frontend development: setting the structure, developing the component library, and laying the foundation for how we build interfaces going forward. In short – you’ll own the frontend, with the opportunity to influence technical decisions and build solutions that are used by real customers in production.
   

  

 This is a role for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment, where you’re encouraged to take initiative, solve problems, and make quick decisions when needed. You’ll have a lot of freedom, but also clear responsibility for driving the products forward in close collaboration with backend/fullstack developers, product managers, and designers.
   

  

 Who we think you are
   

  

* Strong knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS - with a keen eye for interfaces and user experience.
* Experience working with frameworks such as Angular or React.
* It’s definitely a plus if you have experience building and maintaining component libraries and custom components.
* Some experience with .NET backend.
* Worked with testing (e.g., Cypress) is also beneficial.
* Experience from a SaaS company is an advantage, as well as having worked with product development and feeling comfortable communicating and advocating for your ideas and solutions.
* You’re curious, proactive, and communicative, with the ability to see the bigger picture – from idea to product in production. You enjoy building new things, driving change, and taking ownership.
* Fluent in Swedish and English.


 Why join us?
   

  

 We are a mission-driven company where your ideas have real impact. You’ll be part of a small, empowered product team - not a feature factory. Work closely with talented peers who value trust, autonomy, and craftsmanship, all in a hybrid setup at the heart of Stockholm.
   

  

 Excited by what you’ve read? We’d love to hear from you!

title: Full-Stack Developer for Early AI SaaS Startup (Stealth Mode)
description:
🚀
 **Hiring: Full-Stack Developer for Early AI SaaS Startup (Stealth Mode)** 




**We’re quietly building something big.** 




 A next-generation
 **AI SaaS platform in the education space** 
 — designed to transform how people learn, create, and share knowledge.
 



 We’re in
 **stealth mode** 
 , already in conversation with potential investors and enterprise buyers, but we’re taking our time to build the right team before moving fast.
 



  





 🧩
 **The Role** 




 You’ll be the
 **first developer** 
 joining the founder to help build our MVP from the ground up.
 



 You’ll shape the product, choose the tech stack, and bring the first version to life.
 



 It’s a remote, flexible role — ideal for someone who’s studying or working elsewhere but wants to
 **create something meaningful** 
 in their own time.
 



 If it’s a great fit, there’s room to grow into a
 **full-time position, tech lead, or even co-founder with equity.** 




  





 💡
 **Your Skillset** 




 We’re looking for a self-driven full-stack developer with a strong grasp of modern SaaS fundamentals:
 


* **Frontend & backend development** 
 (React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, or similar)
* **Authentication systems** 
 (secure login & account management)
* **Integration with AI services** 
 (OpenAI, Gemini, etc.)
* **Cloud deployment** 
 (AWS, GCP, or similar)
* **Database management** 
 (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc.)
* **Social sharing & content integration**
* Bonus: Experience with
 **SaaS platforms, AI tools, or creative automation**



  





 🌍
 **Who You Are** 




 You’re a
 **builder** 
 , not a button pusher. You:
 


* Love creating things from scratch and seeing them come to life.
* Are curious, independent, and motivated by learning.
* Take ownership and thrive without micromanagement.
* Believe that collaboration, respect, and integrity matter more than titles.



 You might not know everything yet — that’s fine. What matters is your
 **drive to figure things out.** 




  





 🏗️
 **Who We Are** 




 We’re an early-stage AI startup
 **building in stealth** 
 .
 



 Our culture is
 **flat, transparent, and built on trust** 
 .
 



 We believe in freedom, innovation, and accountability — not hierarchy or politics.
 



 You’ll be part of a team that values curiosity, open dialogue, and mutual respect regardless of background, belief, or identity.
 



 We’re a small team with big ambitions, and we treat each other like family.
 



  





 🌱
 **Why Join Us** 



* You’ll have
 **real ownership** 
 and direct influence on the product.
* You’ll learn fast and ship fast — no bureaucracy.
* You’ll be trusted to do your best work on your own terms.
* You’ll be part of something that can
 **reshape how knowledge is shared globally.**
* If we click, you’ll have a chance to grow into a
 **core team member or co-founder with equity.**



  





 💬
 **Interested?** 




 If this sounds like your kind of challenge — let’s talk.
 



 Send a message or apply directly here on LinkedIn.
 



  





 #startup #ai #saas #developer #fullstackdeveloper #hiring #educationtechnology #futureoflearning #remotework #innovation

title: Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
**About this opportunity:**
 Hardware Engineering strives to be the most competitive Radio Network R&D unit in the industry. We work in an agile set-up to develop and maintain competitive, high-quality Radio products which give our customer solutions securing future growth.
   

  

 Control Software is part of the Hardware Engineering (EU HW) Radio within Business Area Networks (BNEW). We are based in Kista, Stockholm. We also have a close corporation with development of PEU Radio products in Ottawa, Beijing, Nanjing, Chengdu, Lund and Zagreb.
   

  

 Control Software provides possibility to work with the latest technology within telecommunication development. We can offer a rich number of opportunities in an everyday learning, creative and challenging atmosphere where Kista, Stockholm, is our base but the world is our arena.
   

  

 We provide the SW platform for radio products also known as the auxiliary control system (XCS). We organize in cross functional development teams, and we are involved in several activities at the same time. We are in an intense phase, due to 5G development, with many new products in the pipeline. There is a high pressure on quality, flexibility and understanding of HW and SW. It also means working with skilled colleagues in an inspiring environment.
   

  

 We are now looking for a Developer to develop the auxiliary control system (XCS) for radio. Your role will include system design, SW design, trouble shooting in target environment and product documentation. Knowledge about Linux and SW close to HW is of high value.
   

  

 Team has the end-to-end responsibility for developing and maintaining our Production System loops which are used for quality assurance, building, and delivering XCS products.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* You will drive strategic technical leadership
* Develop and test high quality products
* Perform trouble shooting internally and on customer networks as well as handling customer support in general
* Drive continuous improvements of products and processes
* Develop competence in technical domain
* Execute continuous improvements of products and processes, bring up new SW platforms
* You will be given a more specific area of responsibility after becoming productive, and depending of interest


**The skills you bring:**
* Education: MSc in engineering or similar
* Min 2 years of relevant experience
* Domain experience: Linux and SW close to HW, systemization and trouble shooting, ASIC knowledge is benificial
* Experience from SW development in a Linux environment using e.g. GIT, Gerrit, Junit, Jenkins, Nexus, Bash/Shell, Artifactory
* Several years of experience working with C/C++ in an embedded environment
* Experience from designing and executing automated test scripts in Java, Python or similar.
* Product development knowledge and Product Lifecycle Management knowledge
* Ability to work with highly competent colleagues
* Being flexible and responding to change
* Delivering results and meeting customer expectations


**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 768208

title: Java Developer
description:
**About Kambi**
*Kambi Group plc is a leading B2B provider of premium sports betting services to licensed gaming operators. Our services provide an end-to-end solution for operators wanting to launch a standalone Sportsbook or bolster their existing offering with an innovative sports betting product. From front-end user interface to customer intelligence, risk management and odds compiling, all built on our in-house developed software, we strive to deliver the ultimate service and solution to our partners.*
*Our vision is to create the world’s leading sports betting experiences, together with our partners.*
**Java Developer – Join Kambi Engineering in Stockholm**
 Are you ready to take your development career to the next level? Kambi Engineering is looking for a Java Developer to join our Stockholm-based team.
   

  

 With offices in Malta (HQ), Philadelphia, London, Bucharest, Manila, Sydney, Uppsala, and Stockholm, we’re a global team of 950+ passionate, highly skilled individuals. We pride ourselves on being at the forefront of the sports technology industry. Here's your chance to be a part of our success story!
   

  

**The Role**
 As a Java Developer, you’ll help strengthen our teams’ ability to turn user stories into high-quality, shippable code. To succeed in this role, we believe you should have previous experience in building scalable and maintainable applications that run and fail gracefully. You should possess both theoretical and practical knowledge of agile and/or lean software development.
   

  

 At Kambi, we strongly believe in self-organized teams. You’ll work in a cross-functional, self-managing team where you will:
   

  

  

* Participate in discussions, grooming sessions, and retrospectives to continuously improve our product and processes.
* Collaborate with Product Owners to share technical insights.
* Troubleshoot and solve production incidents in a complex, high-performance environment.


**Tools & Frameworks**
 Here are some of the tools and technologies we use in our backend teams:
   

  

  

* Java / Kotlin
* REST/Json
* Linux
* AWS
* Helm
* Kubernetes
* Apache Kafka
* Git
* Postgres
* Redis


 We operate in DevOps teams, which means you’ll have the opportunity to take full ownership of our products and components, from idea to deployment and support. This also includes being on call.
   

  

**What We Look For**
 To fit well in our team, you should have a curious mindset, be triggered by challenges, and love working collaboratively. You’re passionate about development, eager to learn, and thrive in an environment where knowledge-sharing is key. As an international company, our main working language is English.
   

  

**What’s in It for You?**
* An opportunity to work in a successful and fast-growing international company.
* We operate in the AWS cloud and offer an exciting environment where you can grow and learn.
* The ability to influence your team’s work environment and processes directly.
* Access to continuous learning: internal training, industry conferences, hackathons, and other collaborative events.


 At Kambi, we believe in the importance of work-life balance and making it part of our everyday culture. We believe that both you as well as Kambi benefit from having happy, healthy colleagues. You will join one of our Stockholm-based development teams with a hybrid work setup.
   

  

 We’re curious about your story. If you’d like to meet us, please apply with your CV.
   

  

 #wearekambi
   

  

***Kambi's ongoing commitment to Diversity and Inclusion in the workplace***
*If you require any reasonable adjustment during the recruitment process, please notify your recruiter, who will assist you however they can. Diversity and inclusion is at the heart of who we are and who we aim to be. While we are proud of the positive and inclusive company culture we have created, we know we can do so much more. Kambi constantly evolves its Diversity and Inclusion strategy to ensure it becomes an even more inclusive and positive place to work, with the core management team reaffirming its commitment to delivering on employee feedback.*
***Creating an inclusive environment***
*We believe Kambi's greatest strength is the collective talent of our employees. Kambi is committed to ensuring we create an inclusive work environment where everyone can feel valued, thrive and achieve their potential, regardless of who they are or what their background is. We know that it is only by having a balance of different voices, values and opinions that Kambi is able to be the market leader it is today.*
*#wearekambi*

title: Developer
description:
*Vi tror på ett samhälle format av framgångsrika företag där entreprenörskap och samhällsnytta går hand i hand. Att vara en del av Fortnox är att vara en del av en ständig förändring - en förändring där du själv bestämmer hur långt du vill nå. Vårt största fokus är att ge dig rätt förutsättningar att få leva din passion tillsammans med oss. Var du kommer ifrån är inte relevant - det är vart du är på väg som är intressant för oss. Precis som vi igår inte kunde drömma om det Fortnox som finns idag, så kan du vara med och forma vilka vi är imorgon.*
**Om tjänsten**
 På Fortnox Financial Services utvecklar vi innovativa lösningar som hjälper Sveriges företagare att få betalt för sina tjänster och hantera sin finansiering. Vi bygger finansiella produkter som fungerar sömlöst med Fortnox core-produkter och vårt uppdrag är att komplettera och förstärka Business Platforms erbjudande med värdeskapande fintech-lösningar som gör livet enklare för Sveriges företagare. Vi är alltså den finansiella motorn i plattformen och en växande satsning inom Fortnox.
   

  

 Vi söker nu utvecklare som vill ta nästa steg tillsammans med oss och forma framtidens FinTech lösning på Fortnox – i Malmö, Växjö, Linköping och Stockholm. Som utvecklare hos oss blir du en nyckelspelare i ett tvärfunktionellt team med helhetsansvar för utvecklingen - från idé till lansering. Vi arbetar agilt, produktnära och med stort fokus på kundvärde. Som utvecklare får du möjlighet att arbeta genom hela teknikstacken och påverka såväl tekniska val som metoder och leverans. Vi jobbar enligt Product Operating Model - ett nära samarbete mellan utvecklare, produktchefer och designers, där vi bygger skalbara och användarvänliga FinTech-tjänster. Du blir del av en kultur som präglas av innovation, nyfikenhet, kunskapsdelning och ständig utveckling.
   

  

**Vi arbetar med**
* Frontend: JavaScript/TypeScript, React
* Backend: Java, Kotlin
* Integrationer och data: REST-API:er, SQL-databaser, Kafka
* Övrigt: Microservices, AI/Machine Learning, GitHub/Bitbucket


**Om dig**
 Du är en erfaren utvecklare med ett genuint teknikintresse, som trivs i en föränderlig miljö där nya idéer välkomnas och omsätts i praktiken. Du är självgående, lösningsorienterad och delar gärna med dig av din kunskap till andra.
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du har:
   

  

* Flera års erfarenhet av professionell mjukvaruutveckling.
* Stark kompetens inom backend (Java, Kotlin) och gärna även frontend (React, TypeScript).
* Kunskap och intresse för ML/Algoritmer.
* Erfarenhet av agila arbetssätt och produktnära utveckling.
* God kommunikationsförmåga på svenska och engelska.


**Våra orter**
 Oavsett var du utgår ifrån kommer du att tillhöra ett team med stort ansvar och starkt driv. Vi tillämpar en
 **hybridmodell** 
 med 3 dagar på kontoret och 2 dagar hemifrån. Varje team har stort inflytande över hur det organiserar sig.
   

  

* Stockholm – på Linnégatan 89 hittar du en komplett fin-tech hubb! Här finns en bredd av kompetenser och du blir del av ett tvärfunktionellt team som tillsammans positionerar Fortnox som Sveriges mest spännande fin-tech bolag!
* Växjö – Fortnox huvudkontor och vår största hubb för utveckling!
* Malmö – Centralt kontor på Drottninggatan 34, här är nya utvecklingsteam under uppbyggnad så du får vara med på något nytt i tidigt skede!
* Linköping – Här bygger vi något helt nytt: algoritmer, ML och nästa generations finansiella system!


**Varför Fortnox?**
 Vi erbjuder inte bara en plats i ett av Sveriges mest spännande FinTech-bolag – vi erbjuder även:
   

  

* En kultur där lärande och utveckling står i centrum.
* En plats i ett av Sveriges mest snabbväxande företag.
* Möjlighet att göra skillnad, för Sveriges företagare och samhället i stort.
* Flexibla arbetssätt och en hybridmodell som fungerar i vardagen.
* Kollegor som bryr sig – om produkten, om våra användare och om varandra.


**Fortnox – mitt i företagslivet**
 Fortnox hjälper företag att starta, växa och utvecklas. Med smarta tekniska lösningar för företag och redovisningsbyråer, smidig finansiering och ett ekosystem av starka partnerskap är Fortnox ett nav för företagande i Sverige. Vi drivs av visionen om ett välmående samhälle format av framgångsrika företag.
   

  

 Fortnox grundades 2001 med huvudkontor i Växjö. Läs mer på www.fortnoxgroup.com.
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan!**

title: Senior .NET Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Strong professional experience with backend systems in C# and .NET Core.
* Solid understanding of cloud-native architecture and CI/CD pipelines.
* Excellent communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* Experience of migrating components to Kubernetes
* Experience with Kubernetes and AWS in production


**Meritorious**
* Knowledge of distributed, service-oriented architectures.
* Familiarity with databases such as MySQL, MSSQL, or Redis.
* Additional programming languages (e.g., C++, Python, Kotlin).


**Application deadline:** 
 20-11-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Developer
description:
*Vi tror på ett samhälle format av framgångsrika företag där entreprenörskap och samhällsnytta går hand i hand. Att vara en del av Fortnox är att vara en del av en ständig förändring - en förändring där du själv bestämmer hur långt du vill nå. Vårt största fokus är att ge dig rätt förutsättningar att få leva din passion tillsammans med oss. Var du kommer ifrån är inte relevant - det är vart du är på väg som är intressant för oss. Precis som vi igår inte kunde drömma om det Fortnox som finns idag, så kan du vara med och forma vilka vi är imorgon.*
**Om tjänsten**
 I vårt affärsområde Business Platform utvecklar vi Fortnox centrala SaaS-produkter, vilka utgör kärnan i vårt erbjudande. Här skapar vi smarta, skalbara och användarvänliga lösningar som dagligen används av hundratusentals företag i Sverige. Bland våra kunder finns en stor variation, från enskilda företagare till redovisningsbyråer. Vårt ansvar sträcker sig över produktområdena Redovisa, Ta Betalt, Medarbetare och Byråstöd & Rapportera – allt det som utgör grunden i kundernas vardag. Samtidigt jobbar vi tätt ihop med våra kollegor inom Financial Services för att tillsammans erbjuda en sömlös helhetslösning, där kärnprodukterna möter smarta tilläggstjänster inom t.ex. betalningar och finansiering.
   

  

 Som utvecklare På Business Platform får du vara med och utveckla produkter som spelar en avgörande roll i Fortnox plattform och där varje förbättring får stor effekt för våra kunder. Som utvecklare hos oss blir du en del av ett autonomt team med helhetsansvar för sina produkter – från idé till produktion. Vi jobbar agilt och produktnära, med stort fokus på teknik, innovation och kundnytta. Du kommer att ha möjlighet att arbeta både frontend och backend och att bidra till tekniska beslut, arkitektur och metodutveckling.
   

  

**Vår Tech-stack (varierar mellan team)**
* Backend: Java, Kotlin, Go, PHP, Node.js

* Trivs i en föränderlig miljö där du får bidra med din kompetens, nyfikenhet och kreativitet
* Kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska


**Våra orter**
* Växjö – Fortnox huvudkontor! Här utvecklar vi flera av våra centrala core-produkter och huserar majoriteten av Business Platforms 27 utvecklingsteam.

* Linköping - ett av våra mindre kontor som präglas av sammansvetsade team och stark gemenskap. Här utvecklar vi företagsbrevlådan och våra värdefulla rapport- och analysprodukter, vilka är centrala för våra kunders framgång.


 Vi arbetar hybrid: 3 dagar på kontoret och 2 dagar hemifrån. Vi uppmuntrar teamen att själva organisera sitt arbetssätt.
   

  

**Varför Fortnox?**
* En plats i ett av Sveriges mest snabbväxande techbolag
* Möjlighet att påverka teknik, arkitektur och produktutveckling
* Kollegor som delar din passion för kod, kundvärde och ständig förbättring
* En kultur där lärande, delaktighet och samarbete står i centrum

 Fortnox hjälper företag att starta, växa och utvecklas. Med smarta tekniska lösningar för företag och redovisningsbyråer, smidig finansiering och ett ekosystem av starka partnerskap är Fortnox ett nav för företagande i Sverige. Vi drivs av visionen om ett välmående samhälle format av framgångsrika företag.
